Do you have a pesky enemy satelite in LKO? Or in GKO? Or around the moon you're mining? Or the planet? Or a moon around a completely different planet?

Wherever it is, you need FishPi Industries Manta long range interceptor.

Wherever it is, the Manta can get to it, then cause it major inconvenience with it's six double savlos of dumb torpedos each of which has some chance of hitting it's target.

Javascript is disabled. View full album
Javascript is disabled. View full album

Notes for the brave pilot.

And aggressive approach is needed to reach orbit, start the prograde marker at 60 degrees and keep it as high as you dare until the apoapsis is about 29K, then climb slowly and blast your way out of the atmosphere like the avenging deathfish you are.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/miaqdh3wh3gavbs/MV1%20NMJ.craft?dl=0

I had to...
Interesting miner, so when can we get our grubby hands on episode 19, and I dare ask, do I get to be in it?

Interesting miner, so when can we get our grubby hands on episode 19, and I dare ask, do I get to be in it?

Well, originally I planned for your ships to be in this episode but recently I've written some great stuff involving your company which will act as one of the major story arcs for the second series. Patience you must have youngling... Anyway, if you want the Miner then you're going to have to ask Rune; He built it, much like all other ships for season 1 xD. Episode 19 should be out by monday.

major story arc...sweeeeeeeet, I'm going to try and surpass the Reaper-class carrier, and it shall be glorious, but I need a name, War Eagle 1, I need your help, I was thinking "Annihilator" but that doesn't sound too stealth enough, can anyone give me suggestions on what the next ship name should be?

major story arc...sweeeeeeeet, I'm going to try and surpass the Reaper-class carrier, and it shall be glorious, but I need a name, War Eagle 1, I need your help, I was thinking "Annihilator" but that doesn't sound too stealth enough, can anyone give me suggestions on what the next ship name should be?

Inquisitor, Interrogator, Assassin, Shade, Vampire, Ghost, Panther...
I like Inquisitor, thanks daemonCaptrix.
I feel like I should post a download for my stealth ship.

So... after watching a documentary on EOD infantry in Afghanistan (US Army/Marine Corp EOD to be exact), I've made a sort of Kerbal MRAP that I call the BRAT.

(Second pic shows the cool 'ol digital wrap-around display that allows the thing to not need a windshield.)

Expect a BDArmory version soon, most likely with a Vulcan and a small rocket system. (I also might make an AA Laser variant.)
Do it daemonCaptrix.

I had to...

For the win!

I had to...

ROFL! That's what happens when a badly-clipped design like that one has a bad day. And by "bad day" I mean you slightly coughed when you were landing. It may be beautiful, but it's fragile! It's great to see these snippets of your work in progress, and take your time and ignore us angry mob looking for the fix. It's done when it's done!

Rune. I may depend a bit too much in my two year experience piloting stuff on KSP, I don't remember blowing it up like that in testing. ^^'

Now, do I have to tell you I've updated what I'm laughably calling my catalog here?

Of course, in asking the question I have. Result.

Well I have been working on a stealth bomber using SP+ mod.

My initial inspiration was the B-2 Spirit but it ended up looking like a mix between the mythical Aurora and GA-TL1 Longsword from Halo

I especially like how I turned the cargo bays into BOMB BAYS.

Managed to get it to hold 12 BD Armory Bombs.

Im debating submitting it or waiting until .25 comes out and remaking it using SP+ as stock

Edited September 20, 2014 by War Eagle 1

It comes with:

That's a fighter?

More like a corvette xD

Wow, some great ships in the works guys

YAY!.... holy sh*t, I don't think I've ever released so many videos in such a short space of time.

That's a fighter?

More like a corvette xD

Actually, that really depends on your definition of "starfighter". I tend to define it as a one-to-two man starship, with light/medium armor and a decent propulsion package.

Of course, the Corona's not a carrier-type fighter by any means, but it doesn't need to be. It has got ions for long-range travel, and isn't some uber-heavyweight ship.

TL;DR:

I like not having to skimp on things to make my fighters fit in a carrier, since carriers are (more often than not) fat 'ol targets for capital ships and other large fighters.

Also, this is my "corvette":

(It's a bit heavier than any of my fighters, and is my oldest working combat ship; its payload consists of twin 1.25 meter Shredder (guided shrapnel-filled) torps, with small i-beam missiles as backup.)

EDIT: Also, you're gonna need to put your picture for that frigate up on imgur or another image hosting site, since we can't remotely access your hard disk.

Wow, some great ships in the works guys

YAY!.... holy sh*t, I don't think I've ever released so many videos in such a short space of time.

Congrats, dude! Keep up the great vids.
